PrecisAppointment of ROBERT RAE, P.C., C.C., O.Ont., Q.C., of Toronto, Ontario, as Special Advisor to the Prime Minister, to be known as Special Envoy to Myanmar, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending January 31, 2018.
